QuestData.Title: Return to Nyoma
QuestData.Description: It will be easy to get you a flight back to Dolanaar. Since you already know Fidelio in Dolanaar, you'll be able to fly back there without any problems.$B$BWhenever you arrive in a new town, you should remember to speak to the flight master so that you can fly to and from the new location.$B$BSpeak with me when you're ready to hire a hippogryph to return to Dolanaar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Leora to hire a hippogryph to take you back to Dolanaar. Once you've arrived in Dolanaar, take Sister Aquinne's Note to Nyoma.
QuestData.RewardText: It sounds like she loved it. Thank you for bringing the book to Sister Aquinne, $N. One of these days, I intend to take her up on her invitation to visit her in Darnassus.
